briefTitle: Safety,Tolerability and Immunogenicity of Vaccination With Rotateq in Healthy Infants in India (V260-021)

armGroups.label: RotaTeq™ Vaccine (V260)
interventionNames: Biological: Rotavirus Vaccine, Live, Oral, Pentavalent

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Age 6 weeks through exactly 12 weeks
* Healthy infants

Exclusion Criteria:

* Clinical evidence of active gastrointestinal illness
* Fever, with a rectal temperature of greater than and equal to thirty eight degree celsius at the time of immunization
* History of congenital abdominal disorders, intussusception, or abdominal surgery
* History of known prior rotavirus disease
* Known or suspected impairment of immunological function
* Prior administration of any rotavirus vaccine
* Known hypersensitivity to any component of the rotavirus vaccine, e.g. trypsin
